DiagnosticWidgets module¶

class DiagnosticWidgets.PlotWindow(parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QWidget

QWidget with a matplotlib fig axis. In the main aspax widget, this is the class that generates a plot of the current xray being annotated along with all the annotations drawn so far. MainWindow.InspectXrays.display_all_current_annotations initialises this class as an attribute MainWindow.InspectXrays.display_window that contains the plot above.

Variables

  • figure (matplotlib.figure.Figure) -- Figure for plot of annotations

  • canvas (matplotlib.backends.backend_qt4agg.FigureCanvasQTAgg) -- canvas holding the figure attribute

  • ax (matplotlib.axes.axis) -- axis added to figure attribute

  • button (QPushButton) -- unused button, can be linked to a plot method

Parameters

parent --

imshow(im)[source]¶
plot(x, y)[source]¶

plot some random stuff

plot_with_labels(x, y, label)[source]¶
